Meet Some Of The Internet’s Happiest Shoppers – tophatterdiscovery – Medium
Led primary research for Product and Marketing teams to improve business and brand metrics.Designed and executed research studies to inform product and marketing decisions.
Led quantitative and qualitative research to support Product Management and Marketing efforts toward commercialization of groundbreaking automotive products like Olli, Strati and NEV.

Led Business Insights Department while splitting time on strategy projects. On the BI Side, I was tasked with leading the transition of digital campaign reporting from Excel to Tableau for Demand Generation clients. On the Strategy side I introduced several academic theories and strategic frameworks that led to success on many key projects including RFP wins for national CPG brands.

• Founding member of LT's strategy and analytics team.• Creator, Founder and Manager of E.B. Lane's Incite Community, a social media based research group comprised of local Millennial consumers. • Turned qualitative and quantitative research insights into growth strategy for clients focused on digital, social and Millennial market solutions.

recommendations: Christina Pan
Consumer Web/Mobile Product Management
October 15, 2017, Matthew worked with Christina in the same group

Matt is a team player with strong work ethic and drive and an intuitive understanding of consumer psychology. He brought critical customer insights to our team that helped clarify key customer anxieties and hurdles in our product experience, and that significantly influenced our product design decisions especially for new customer onboarding. I also greatly appreciate his dedication to seeking and quickly incorporating feedback to optimally tailor results to be the most digestible and useful to the team.

VP User Experience & Design at Tophatter
October 13, 2017, Ali managed Matthew directly

Matt is a team player with a positive attitude who listens to others, reflects on conversations and participates with thoughtful ideas. He is extremely easy to talk with and can connect with anyone, which really helps when he’s conducting interviews with users of different demographics. Matt’s strong analytical skills are valuable when deriving meaning from research data, and most importantly, he is interested in learning and growing in his role. I enjoyed working with Matt during the time he spent at Tophatter.
